snippet.title: BrazSonic 20XX Demo++ International Trailer
snippet.description:
Download now: https://gamejolt.com/games/brasonic20xx/231773


BrazSonic 20XX is an actual reboot of the BrazSonic series, with no links with BrazSonic 1 and BrazSonic 2. The reason for this restart is due to the fact that the BrazSonic 1 is already very aesthetically and technically outdated, and also BraSonic 2 does not have been launched over the last few years.

The game is set in Brazil in the year 20XX (in some time of the 21st century), where the congressman Ivo Corruptnik, who dreams of being President of the country, seeks the Corruption Emeralds to achieve it. However his ambition implies chaos and destruction to the lands and citizens. Then the hero BrazSonic will come into the scene to stop him!



Music: Twelve Speed, by Slynk
